name: Essence Shift
desc: Slark steals the life essence of enemy heroes with his attacks, draining each of their attributes and converting them to bonus Agility.

name: Reincarnation
desc: Wraith King's form regroups after death, allowing him to resurrect when killed in battle.  Upon death, enemy units in a 900 radius will be slowed.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Midnight Pulse
desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.

name: Split Earth
desc: Splits the earth under enemies. Deals damage and stuns for a short duration.

name: Meat Hook
desc: Launches a bloody hook toward a unit or location. The hook will snag the first unit it encounters, dragging the unit back to Pudge and dealing damage if it is an enemy.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Unstable Current
desc: Razor moves with increased speed, and hits a random nearby unit with a jolt of electricity every 5 seconds. The jolt deals damages, slows, and purges buffs from enemies.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Frost Blast
desc: Blasts the target enemy unit with damaging frost, dealing area damage and slowing movement and attack rates for 4 seconds.  The primary target takes the most damage.

name: Reality Rift
desc: Teleports you, any images you have and the target unit to a random point along the line between the two of you. Reduces the target's armor for 8 seconds.

name: Plague Ward
desc: Summons a plague ward to attack enemy units and structures. The ward is immune to magic. Wards gain the Poison Sting level from Venomancer, dealing 50% of the full damage.

name: Chemical Rage
desc: Alchemist causes his Ogre to enter a chemically induced rage, reducing base attack cooldown and increasing movement speed and regeneration.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel
